Package de.yamass.redg.generator.extractor.datatypeprovider

Interface DataTypeProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultDataTypeProvider, JpaMetamodelRedGProvider, JsonFileDataTypeProvider, NoPrimitiveTypesDataTypeProviderWrapper, XmlFileDataTypeProvider
public interface DataTypeProvider
Common interface for all data type providers, that are able to decide the java data type for a database column

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getCanonicalDataTypeName(schemacrawler.schema.Column column)
    Called by during the model data extraction process for each column that is being processed with the current column as the parameter.

  • Method Details

    • getCanonicalDataTypeName

      String getCanonicalDataTypeName(schemacrawler.schema.Column column)
      Called by during the model data extraction process for each column that is being processed with the current column as the parameter. This method has to decide on the data type that will later represent this column in the generated java code.

      Information about the Table can be obtained by calling ContainedObject.getParent().

      Information about the SQL Data type and what schemacrawler recommends can be obtained by calling BaseColumn.getColumnDataType().

      Parameters:
      column - The current column
      Returns:
      The canonical name of the data type to use for the given column
